item.title: Compiling error?
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

Replace it with this.

    public boolean playerHasItem(int itemID) {
        for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
            if (playerItems[i] == itemID + 1) {
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;

    }

It should go through, and or fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling error?
item.dc:creator: @SnowBlind SnowBlind
item.description:
@SnowBlind wrote:

Hey, I recently added CWars and I got this error:

illegal start of expression public boolean playerHasItem(int ItemID) { ^
this is the code:

[code]
public boolean playerHasItem(int itemID) {
itemID++;
for (int element : playerItems) {
if (element == itemID) {
return true;
}
}
return false;

}[/code]

But i dont even remeber touching that code whilst doing the cwars. =/

Read full topic
